titleStmt.title: An examination of the case of the Quakers concerning oaths propounded by them, A.D. 1673, to the consideration of the King, and both Houses of Parliament : with a vindication of the power of the magistrate to impose oaths, and the liberty and duty of all Christians to swear by God reverently : humbly submitted to the judgment of His Most Sacred Majesty, and the two Houses of Parliament / by Charles Gataker ...
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Charles, 1614 or 15-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Thomas Collins ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Huntington Library.
